mutants.code:
from collections import Counter

def check_strings(s1, s2):
    s1 = s1.lower()
    s2 = s2.lower()
    dict1 = Counter(s1)
    dict2 = Counter(s2)
    shared_chars = list((dict1 & dict2).elements())
    combined = dict1 - dict2
    is_permutation = Counter(s1) == Counter(s2)
    return (shared_chars, dict(combined), is_permutation)

from collections import Counter

def check_strings(s1, s2):
    s1 = s1.lower()
    s2 = s2.lower()
    dict1 = Counter(s1)
    dict2 = Counter(s2)
    shared_chars = list((dict1 & dict2).elements())
    combined = dict1 * dict2
    is_permutation = Counter(s1) == Counter(s2)
    return (shared_chars, dict(combined), is_permutation)

from collections import Counter

def check_strings(s1, s2):
    s1 = s1.lower()
    s2 = s2.lower()
    dict1 = Counter(s1)
    dict2 = Counter(s2)
    shared_chars = list((dict1 & dict2).elements())
    combined = dict1 + dict2
    is_permutation = Counter(s1) != Counter(s2)
    return (shared_chars, dict(combined), is_permutation)

from collections import Counter

def check_strings(s1, s2):
    s1 = s1.lower()
    s2 = s2.lower()
    dict1 = Counter(s1)
    dict2 = Counter(s2)
    shared_chars = list((dict1 | dict2).elements())
    combined = dict1 + dict2
    is_permutation = Counter(s1) == Counter(s2)
    return (shared_chars, dict(combined), is_permutation)
